duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct support to regional locations with scheduling, routing, tracking, and invoicing assistance, in close partnership with local field leaders and technicians.
Maintain knowledge of assigned market area and provide the most efficient directions and routes possible for technicians.
Ensure that proper information is listed on routing manifests and work orders before technicians leave their facilities.
Review completed work orders with technicians and leaders for accuracy prior to invoicing.
Remove unused inventory from completed work orders and coordinate hotshots and add-on assignments with warehouse and store locations.
